com.demo.custom

Class CustomNotification

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.notification.Notification
      • com.notification.types.WindowNotification
        • com.notification.types.BorderLayoutNotification
          • com.demo.custom.CustomNotification

  • public class CustomNotification
extends BorderLayoutNotification
    This is a CustomNotification which will only have one line of text and a button that will turn into a progress bar.
